channel.title: Colossus PvP - Reworked *RE-OPENING ! -ECO RESETED
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/TFo2QWc.png[/img][/center]
Hello guests, Welcome to Colossus PvP ! How can you make money..? do I hear you ask? Well, one of the best ways is to gear up and go fight to the death in the wilderness with our other Players on the server! That way you can earn PKP and Items Or alternatively, you can go take on the Bosses of the server, or you can Thieve the stall at home to earn some quick cash Or even kill ice queens wich drops pretty nice stuff. Our advertisement thread will show you some of the content.
WebClient link : http://colossuspvp.forumotion.co.uk/h1-webclient
Client Download: https://dl.dropbox.com/s/93kln4mplqgg7uk/NEWCLIENT.jar
Forums : http://colossuspvp.forumotion.co.uk/
-PK point system -bosses are located around the wilderness, It has a chance of PKers visiting you -Barrows -Pest Control -Decent item switches -Fight Caves - 1 Wave -DFS Spec -Awesome Pkp shops
[center][youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9jfdj283InA[/youtube][/center]
[center]PkP Shop 1[/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/4XwK8cB.png[/img][/center]
[center]Pkp Shop 2[/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/H2d9LL8.png[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/3dtQrJu.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/fBjfiMD.png[/img][/center]
